      • search

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> search(java.lang.String key,
                                                                                               java.lang.String value)
        Forwards input to data layer and creates map for the UI. This method forwards the @params to the method DataHandler.search(java.lang.String, java.lang.String). The resulting List of SearchCase objects is then looped through to create a Map to send back to the presentation layer.
        Specified by:
        search in interface IDomain
        Parameters:
        key, - String
        value, - String
        Returns:
